alert.note: Alert for Chariton; Macon; Randolph (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 6:29PM CDT until September 23 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Randolph County in north central Missouri... Northeastern Chariton County in north central Missouri... Southern Macon County in north central Missouri... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Keytesville, or 7 miles northwest of Salisbury, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moberly, Macon, Salisbury, Huntsville, Bevier, Keytesville, Cairo, Jacksonville, Clifton Hill, Wien, Excello and Prairie Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
